question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Complete Design: Spring 2022, Begin Construction: Fall 2022, Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs (CalOES Project), Project Description: The project consists of repairs to the damaged shoulder on Westward Beach Road.
